sentences.en: Alleluia : for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth.
sentences.cn: 哈利路亚!因为主我们的神,全能者作王了.

sentences.en: And are the most omnipotent provider on environment technology and service.
sentences.cn: 是目前国内最全能的环境技术与服务供应商.

sentences.en: Beauty is potent; but money is omnipotent.
sentences.cn: 美丽是有力量的, 但金钱更有权威.

sentences.en: But how do I know you're omnipotent too? Gates.
sentences.cn: 但是我如何知道你也无所不能 呢 ?盖茨.

sentences.en: Covering tissue, thick paper and special materials were printed, almost omnipotent.
sentences.cn: 涵盖了薄纸, 厚纸和特殊材料印件, 几乎无所不能.

sentences.en: Doug lived in the shadow of his seemingly omnipotent father.
sentences.cn: 道格生活在他那看似无所不能的父亲的阴影里。

sentences.en: Feel omnipotent and capable of doing almost anything.
sentences.cn: ——感到无所不能,自信可以做成任何事情.
他是个有很大权力的官僚.

sentences.en: He is famous stunts mimicry, the campaign is omnipotent players.
sentences.cn: 他的特技是名人模仿秀, 在运动方面是万能选手.

sentences.en: Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
sentences.cn: 只有坚持和决心是所向披靡,无所不能的.

sentences.en: Services; Omnipresent. Omnipotent. The transaction needs of the guests.
sentences.cn: 服务; 无所不在. 无所不能. 需要交易的客人.

sentences.en: Since God is conceived to be omnipotent, He is a perfect being.
sentences.cn: 因为上帝被说成是万能的, 所以他是完美无缺的.

sentences.en: The God is finite, and can not be omniscient, omnipotent.
sentences.cn: 上帝是有限的, 而不是无所不知 、 无所不能的.

sentences.en: The omnipotent God will help us.
sentences.cn: 万能的上帝会帮助我们的.

sentences.en: Tom: My omnipotent god, what do 10,000 golden coins mean to you?
sentences.cn: 汤姆: 我万能的上帝, 一万枚金币对你来说,意味着 什么 ?

sentences.en: When we are omnipotent we shall have no more need of science.
sentences.cn: 我们达到万能以后就不需要科学了.
